website_summaries.verdict: This first-rate MSI desktop computer is ideal for novice and expert gamers alike.
pros: Equipped with a super-charging mechanism that helps you quickly recharge smartphones, tablets and other devices from the computer's USB ports
Premium sound system delivers high-quality sound
Cooling system performs consistently and operates quietly while you use the computer
cons: May be challenging to install operating system upgrades
Motherboard sometimes fails, even after minimal use

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch!
customer_reviews.text: Superb permormance. Best Value for the buck. Loving it from the day it arrived. For this price range, this is the best Gaming Beast. You won't be ddisappointed. BTW, mine is paired the GTX 1070 one.
customer_reviews.author: Kakarot

customer_reviews.title: great computer
customer_reviews.text: Great little computer. Replaced my son's 3 year old computer we built ourselves. (he plays all the latest PC games, mostly first person shooters, no issues) This one blew it away and there was no fuss. Plug and play. OS is installed on the correct drive.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a great computer, the GTX 1080 is a powerhouse card ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a great computer, the GTX 1080 is a powerhouse card which I will use for at least 3 years. Im happy with the small footprint, it does make noise but compared to my older game pc its very quite even when playing intensive games. You can open it up and upgrade it, which is a bonus, and the separation of the power supply from the main pc will help with good temperatures inside this small unit. There is a water cooled version (for the processor) I contact MSI and they do not sell the components to upgrade this unit, which is unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great machine for a prebuilt
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great machine for a prebuilt. Wish it had more ram and the hard drive hadn't been partitionedited the way it had. But it works beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging. Great build quality
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging. Great build quality. Works perfectly out of box. Can't ask for anything else. Good value too, making it yourself would maybe save you $200, but is that really worth the hassle and lack of warranty/support?
customer_reviews.author: Nicoy3k

customer_reviews.title: Great computer. No complaints yet from my teenage gaming ...
customer_reviews.text: Great computer. No complaints yet from my teenage gaming computer snob. He loves it, runs all his games well. I think this one might last a couple years...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a monstrous computer! I am using for Oculus Rift and it works flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: Sougato C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for CAD drawings
customer_reviews.text: I use this computer for 3D-CAD designing. It works great so far. I haven't come across any lagging when rotating 3D models. Pretty fast startup.
customer_reviews.author: Imaze13

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: This is a design of beauty wrapped in a gaming machine. Not to crazy not even close to boring to look at and a fantastic price. Thank you MSI and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dow

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: By far the worst experience I have ordering a PC. I did one day air because I needed the machine ASAP. It worked for 1 day then the mother board failed and it would not boot at all. I had to send it back and now I have to wait almost a week for it to get back to Amazon before I will be credited so I can get a new one. Buyer beware this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, Looks Great, Nice Airflow, Small with Carrying Handle
customer_reviews.text: I currently have the Aegis and I am quite thrilled with the PC in whole. The design is modern and looks great. Both of my parents said "Wow" when opened the box it came in. The case itself is very small and comes with a handle in the back to carry around my Loft with ease. The ventilation is very efficient and when playing Overwatch at 1440p 144hz on Medium settings my GPU never gets above 55C. Buying the Aegis was worth every penny IMO. I paid the extra $150-250 to have it prebuilt and to not have to worry about receiving any dead components and waiting for delivery if any part I bought individually was dead.
customer_reviews.author: Chrono

product_meta.title: MSI VR Ready Aegis-061US Powerhouse Gaming Desktop Geforce GTX 1080 i7-6700 16GB 512GB SSD + 2TB Windows 10
product_meta.description:
Style:i7-6700 | GTX 1080 | 16GB | 512GB + 2TBREADY FOR THE FUTURE
The era of VR gaming is now and the Aegis series is ready. With more than enough power and performance to enter the realm of virtual reality gaming, step into the future and experience gaming like never before.

NAHIMIC AUDIO ENHANCER
Nahimic audio software offers high definition sound technology which boosts the audio and voice performance of your gaming computer. Enjoy an immersive virtual 7.1 sound over your standard stereo equipment!

SILENT STORM COOLING 2
To get outstanding performance Aegis is equipped with a powerful cooling system, Silent Storm Cooling 2. Embracing two separate chambers that individually take care of the cooling of different components within the Aegis, the unique ‘Silent Storm Cooling 2’ design makes sure the system’s temperature stays perfectly under control, supporting a cool and silent operation. You can even install an advanced liquid cooling system to enable extreme CPU overclocking.

EASY ACCESS TO COMPONENTS
For those who always want to get the best out of their system, the components of the Aegis series are easily accessible and ready to be upgraded at any time. Whether it is storage, a processor or a graphics card, you can always keep your Aegis gaming rig up to date with the latest hardware.

SUPER CHARGER 2
With MSI Super Charger 2 you can provide 10x more power to USB devices compared to traditional USB ports. With this, you can quickly charge devices such as tablets and smartphones, eliminating the need for wall power sockets.
feature_bullets: Form Factor: ITX (Ultra Small Form Factor Design)
Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 Quad Core Processor (3.4-4GHz) | Motherboard: B150 Chipset
Graphics Card: NVIDIA's Latest GeForce GTX 1080 8GB GDDR5
RAM: 16GB (8GB x2) DDR4 2133MHz | Hard Drive: PCI-E GEN3 x4 NVMe 512GB SSD + 2TB (SATA) 7200RPM
Special features: VR READY | Silent Storm Cooling 2 | Screen in Screen Dragon Eye | Mystic Light | Nahimic Sound Sytem
